Google Chrome's JavaScript V8 Engine.
It is used to develop I/O intensive web applications like video streaming sites, single-page applications, and other web applications.

Node.js = Runtime Environment + JavaScript Library

FEATURES:
Asynchronous and Event Driven
Single Threaded but Highly Scalable
No Buffering

WHERE TO USE?

I/O bound Applications
Data Streaming Applications
Data Intensive Real-time Applications (DIRT)
JSON APIs based Applications
Single Page Applications

REPL operations $node 
single thread Applications 
events and callbacks . async function
event listener function to execute

https://code.tutsplus.com/tutorials/real-time-sports-application-using-nodejs--cms-30594

* Interface, basics of dotnet core , dependency injection, webAPI CRUD Operations, Configurationbuilder, XUNIT , Facts, Theory
* Node basics, Http server
